LanguageData.rimwarLink.d: It only works if you use RimWar together. Bond prices fluctuate according to the power of the RimWar system.
LanguageData.rimwarPriceFactor.d: RimWar's faction power X this value = the bond's price
LanguageData.dividendPer.d: The total value of the bond is multiplied by this value to determine the value of the dividend.
LanguageData.DelistingPrice.d: When the price of a bond falls below this price, bonds disappear.
LanguageData.limitDate.d: bonds are removed after the limited period.
LanguageData.militaryAid_multiply.d: It determines how strong the reinforcement group that comes when using bonds is.\nEven if this option is high, a small reinforcement group will come if the price of the bond is low.
LanguageData.loanScale.d: The amount that can be borrowed at one time and the maximum amount that can be borrowed will change.
LanguageData.warbond_d:
War bonds are made by each faction.

Instead of consuming bonds using a communicator, military aid can be requested, and the scale of the army coming from military aid is proportional to the current market price of the bond.

The price of bonds is constantly changing, and you can use them to buy at a lower price and increase the price. There are people who have become very wealthy by selling them.

Note: When the price falls below Specific price (check option), it is delisted and your bonds disappear.
LanguageData.bond.dividendArrived: A dividend of ${2} value arrived by [{0}](x{1}).
LanguageData.bond.delisting: [{0}] has been delisted because its price is below ${1}. They created bonds at a new price.
LanguageData.bond.delisting.destroy: [{0}] has been delisted because its price is below ${1}. All of your [{0}] have disappeared, and they created bonds at a new price.
LanguageData.bond.quest.up: The price of [{0}] increased by {1}% as a result of your quest.
LanguageData.bond.quest.down: The price of [{0}] has decreased by {1}% due to the effect of your quest.
LanguageData.loan.menu: Easy! fast! Instant loan! - Loan amount: {0} / {1}, due date: {2} remaining
LanguageData.loan.needRepay: have to pay off the debt.
LanguageData.loan.contract:
Contract

Type : Credit loan
Interest : Instant interest accrued once, {0}% / 15days (compound)
Expiration : {1} left

Caution - Failure to repay loans and interest within the due date is considered hostile and will be attacked indefinitely.

The amount owed : {2}
LanguageData.loan.notice.interest: Interest on loan of {0} - {1}x{2} => {1}x{3}, left days : {4}
LanguageData.loan.notice.leftDay: {0}'s dunning letter - {1}x{2}, left days : {3}. If you cannot pay off your debt, file for seizure bankruptcy.
LanguageData.loan.notice.raid: {0}'s dunning letter - If you cannot pay off your debt, file for seizure bankruptcy. We will send more and more troops.
LanguageData.loan.giveUp.notice1:
Seizure bankruptcy

All factions' debts will be cleared.

Instead, they take 70% of all of your items.
